channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vladdy Jr. Motivated by Guerrero Legacy, Compares Blue Jays to an Iconic Team
item.description: After the Toronto Blue Jays opened the World Series with a dominant win over the Los Angeles Dodgers, the defending champions got their revenge in Game 2. The Dodgers evened the Fall Classic on Saturday night in Toronto with a convincing win -- featuring big seventh-inning home runs by Will Smith and Max Muncy and a dominant complete-game performance from Yoshinobu Yamamoto. They now head home for Monday's Game 3.
